title: Biometrics enabling digital banking advances in multiple applications
description: The expansion of biometrics for financial services made up several of the top headlines on Biometric Update this week, with customer wins in several areas, a payment network launching support for device biometrics, and a new technology pitched for a range of applications, including biometric payment cards. A range of applications are creating a wave of biometrics for banking and payments, which is buoying Fourthline, iDenfy, Socure, Bonifii and iProov, among many others, while American Express added a biometric authentication option for online payments. Pragmatic presented its vision for a new alternative to silicon chips for fingerprint sensors that can be used in payment cards and numerous other applications.
